sentences.sContent: A team of divers was sent down to examine the wreck.
sentences.sCn: 一组潜水员被送到水下检查沉船。

sentences.sContent: Hegel’s philosophy will be examined in detail in Chapter 4.
sentences.sCn: 黑格尔的哲学将在第4章作详细探讨。

synos.tran: 检查；调查； 检测；考试

words.tran: 检验员；主考人；[专利] 审查员
应试者；受审查者；受检查者

remMethod.val: exa(看作exam， 考试) + mine(自己) → 考试是为了检查自己 → 检查

trans.tranOther: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it
